title: LuLaRich
description:
Tig and Cheryl buy into "LuLaRich," a pyramid scheme built out of... what else? Colorful leggings! There's fashion talk of course, but also the introduction of a listener named "snarkerbowl"... or is it snkrboi? You'll just have to listen to find out! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
